  • Uses of GameState in AI.mcts.Optimazation.Heuristic

    Methods in AI.mcts.Optimazation.Heuristic with parameters of type GameState
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    CentralityHeuristic.score(GameState state, Move move)
    Scores a move based on its distance to the center of the board
    double
    ConnectivityHeuristic.score(GameState state, Move move)
    Scores a move based on the proportion of adjacent friendly stones
    double
    Heuristic.score(GameState state, Move move)
    Evaluates and scores a potential move in the given game state.
    double
    LinearCombinationHeuristic.score(GameState state, Move move)
    Computes the weighted linear combination of all enabled heuristic components.
    double
    ShortestPathHeuristic.score(GameState state, Move move)
    Scores a move based on how much it reduces the shortest path to winning.

  • Uses of GameState in AI.mcts.Steps

    Methods in AI.mcts.Steps with parameters of type GameState
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Node
    Expansion.expand(Node node, GameState currentState)
    Expands the given node by creating one new child node for an untried move.
    private boolean
    Selection.isFullyExpanded(Node node, GameState state)
    Checks if a node is fully expanded by comparing the number of children to the number of legal moves available.
    Node
    Selection.select(Node node, GameState state)
    Selects a path through the tree from the given node until reaching a node that is either not fully expanded or is terminal.

    Chooses a move using an epsilon-greedy strategy.
    int
    BaseSimulation.simulate(GameState start)
    Simulates a game from the given starting state by randomly playing moves until the game ends.
    int
    OptimizedSimulation.simulate(GameState start)
    Simulates a game from the given starting state using pruned moves and heuristic guidance.
    int
    Simulation.simulate(GameState start)
    Simulates a complete game from the given starting state until a terminal state is reached.
